thread.title: BRIEF-Clarus Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.20

title: BRIEF-Clarus Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.20
text: March 12, 2018 / 8:10 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Clarus Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.20 Reuters Staff March 12 (Reuters) - Clarus Corp: * CLARUS REPORTS STRONG FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS * Q4 SALES $52.7 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $49.3 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.13 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * ANTICIPATES FISCAL YEAR 2018 SALES TO GROW 17%-20% TO ABOUT $200 MILLION -$205 MILLION * IN 2018, ALSO EXPECTS ADJUSTED EBITDA MARGIN TO BE ABOUT 8% * FOR 2018, ON A CONSTANT CURRENCY BASIS, COMPANY EXPECTS SALES TO RANGE BETWEEN $197.5 MILLION TO $202.5 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
